Module Assignment1
Package test

Class ABCompany

java.lang.Object
test.ABCompany
public class ABCompany extends Object
ABCompany class represents a company with attributes like company number, company name, product or service, ranking, country, and share prices.

  • Constructor Details

    • ABCompany

      public ABCompany(int companyNumber, String companyName, String strings, int ranking, String Country, double[] sharePrices2)
      Constructs an ABCompany with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      companyNumber - Unique identifier for the company.
      companyName - The name of the company.
      productOrService - The primary product or service offered by the company.
      ranking - The company's ranking.
      Country - The country in which the company is based.
      sharePrices - An array of the company's recent share prices.

    • ABCompany

      public ABCompany(int companyNumber, String companyName, String productOrServices, double sharePrices)
      Deprecated.
      This constructor is not fully implemented and should not be used.
      Overloaded constructor for ABCompany. Currently, it does not set any attributes and only returns without any action.
      Parameters:
      companyNumber - Unique identifier for the company.
      companyName - The name of the company.
      productOrServices - The primary product or service offered by the company.
      sharePrices - The company's last known share price.
